segments.text: Excuse me , do you know where the Post Office is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it's not very far from here . Follow this road until you get to the traffic lights . You will see a small restaurant at the corner .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is the restaurant on the right or on the left hand side of the road ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is on the right . But it is on the other side of the lights .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Do I turn on the lights or do I go straight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You go straight on at the lights , but just past the restaurant building there is a small road to your right .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And do I take that road ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you need to turn right and follow that road for about four minutes . You will see the Post Office on your left .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there a Post Office sign on the building ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes and it is quite a big building so you won't miss it . There is also a small supermarket next to it .
segments.speaker: S2
